amendment.description: Amendment directs the FAA to work with various federal agencies to integrate Unmanned Aerial Vehicles (UAV's) into the National Airspace System more expeditiously and ensures that all safety studies are carried out as necessary to support such integration.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 12 printed in House Report 112-46 to direct the FAA to work with various federal agencies to integrate Unmanned Aerial Systems into the National Airspace System more expeditiously.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Miller (MI) amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Miller (MI) amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A011) offered by Mrs. Miller (MI).
